dict.acceptation: 幸存，生存；幸存者；遗物；遗风；

sent.orig: The 5 -year overall survival (OS) and disease free survival (DFS) were 89% and 73%,respectively.
sent.trans: 全组5年总生存率和无病生存率分别为89%和73%。

sent.orig: Improved Feign Death (Survival): This talent has been replaced with Survival Tactics.
sent.trans: 强化假死（生存天赋）这个天赋现在被生存战术替代。

sent.orig: RESULTS: The median survival was 11 months, with a 3-year survival of 24%.
sent.trans: 结果：平均生存时间是11个月，3年生存率为24％。

sent.orig: The five-year survival rate (SR),disease free survival rate (DFSR) were 65 6% and 54 5%,respectively.
sent.trans: 总的5年生存率、无瘤生存率分别为65．6％和54．5％。

sent.orig: Graft survival, but not patient survival, was influenced by the presence of NAS.
sent.trans: NAS对移植肝存活有影响，而对患者存活无影响。
